name: CyberArk
description:
CyberArk plugin performs action on CyberArk users like - Add users to a role and Remove users from a role. 
 Note: It does not support fetching users/host or their scores from CyberArk.

configuration.label: Tenant URL
configuration.description: Tenant URL for CyberArk. Example - 'https://<Tenant_ID>.id.cyberark.cloud' or 'https://<Tenant_ID>.id.idaptive.com'.

configuration.label: Username
configuration.description: Username for CyberArk. Make sure to include the domain(suffix) example - user@domain.

configuration.label: Password
configuration.description: Password associated with your CyberArk username.
